Title: Authorizes enforcement officers of city courts in the county of Erie to exercise the same functions, powers and duties as sheriffs in certain situations
Summary: Authorizes enforcement officers of city courts in the county of Erie, designated in lieu of the sheriff, to exercise the same functions, powers and duties as sheriffs with respect to the execution of money judgments of the supreme and family courts.
LawCode: Amd ยง105, UCCA; amd ยง105, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to authorizing enforcement officers of city courts in the county of Erie, designated in lieu of the sheriff, to exercise the same functions, powers and duties as sheriffs with respect to the execution of money judgments of the supreme and family courts; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
